main event: Witness sighted two brilliant objects, leaving a trail of gray-colored vapor, traveling at high speeds, and performing maneuvers in Livermore, California on 05/13/52.
interesting points: The observer described the objects as being very brilliant and heading Northwest, leaving behind a trail of gray-colored vapor.
The objects were observed to be traveling at a very high altitude and at a high rate of speed, estimated to be around 500-700 mph.
The witness reported that the objects seemed to rotate around each other and then vanish suddenly, leaving behind a trail of gray-colored vapor.
After disappearing, a flaming-red colored sphere appeared, hanging fixed in the area and then suddenly vanished as well.
The witness reported seeing a sphere hanging in the middle stratosphere, appearing brilliant and flaming-red in color.
sighted object: Two brilliant objects leaving a trail of gray-colored vapor, and a flaming-red colored sphere
witnesses: Observer in Glasgow, KY and witness in California
